content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in bari in 2011 the case involved a deceased person and the determination of heirs the court allocated various rustic properties and land plots to the heirs through a drawing of lots the court also determined the value of each assigned asset and ordered the heirs to pay a balance for the assets existing easements charges and rights were transferred to the respective lots the court also ordered the parties to compensate the costs of the legal proceedings the case involved several parties including cmg cm cs ca and cv the proceedings began after the death of cv and dealt with the division of the estate and ownership of a flat a judgment was issued in 2003 rejecting the invalidity of a deed related to the flat in 2007 the community property was dissolved and the calculation of usufruct due to c was excluded the parties then opted for a second divisional hypothesis and requested drawing lots the final decision allocated rustic properties to each heir with different values assigned to each the court declared the succession of cv determined the heirs and ordered the payment of a balance and transfer of easements and rights the court also instructed the registrar to transcribe the division and attribution of the properties and ordered the compensation of the costs of the proceedings
